entities.label: United Nations Political Office for Somalia (UNPOS)

edges.label: 1. Subject of Investigation
edges.tooltip: The staff member was investigated for misconduct related to satellite link installation.

edges.label: 2. Investigation Conducted By
edges.tooltip: UNON was responsible for conducting the investigation into the misconduct.

edges.label: 3. Formal Complaint Filed
edges.tooltip: UNPOS filed a formal complaint leading to the investigation.

edges.label: 4. Solicitation of Funds
edges.tooltip: The staff member solicited funds from UNPOS under false pretenses.

edges.label: 5. Violation of Integrity Standards
edges.tooltip: The staff member breached integrity standards by accepting payments without authorization.

edges.label: 6. Unauthorized Financial Transactions
edges.tooltip: The staff member conducted unauthorized financial transactions, violating financial regulations.

edges.label: 7. Report Findings Shared
edges.tooltip: UNON shared the findings of the investigation with the Representative of the Secretary General.

UNON/ITS Staff Member: Engaged in arranging an extension of the satellite link for monetary gain.
Accepted payments under false pretenses without authorization.

Regulation 1.2: Breach of integrity standards by failing to provide service after receiving payment.
